statement:
cdlemg2inv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg2inv.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg2j.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg2j.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemg2j.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg2jOLDN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( F ` ( P .\/ Q ) ) = ( ( F ` P ) .\/ ( F ` Q ) ) ) $.
